IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.DimDate (
    DateKey INT,
    FullDate DATE,
    Day INT,
    DayOfWeek INT,
    DayOfWeekName VARCHAR(20),
    DayOfYear INT,
    WeekOfYear INT,
    Month INT,
    MonthName VARCHAR(20),
    Quarter INT,
    Year INT,
    IsWeekend BIT,
    IsHoliday BIT -- Optionally, you can also add a flag for holidays
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'EXPORT_DateDim.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM staging.DimDate
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH ( 
		LOCATION = 'abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.SalesPerson (
	[BusinessEntityID] nvarchar(4000),
	[Title] nvarchar(4000),
	[FirstName] nvarchar(4000),
	[MiddleName] nvarchar(4000),
	[LastName] nvarchar(4000),
	[Suffix] nvarchar(4000),
	[JobTitle] nvarchar(4000),
	[PhoneNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[PhoneNumberType] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmailAddress] nvarchar(4000),
	[EmailPromotion] nvarchar(4000),
	[AddressLine1] nvarchar(4000),
	[AddressLine2] nvarchar(4000),
	[City] nvarchar(4000),
	[StateProvinceName] nvarchar(4000),
	[PostalCode] nvarchar(4000),
	[CountryRegionName] nvarchar(4000),
	[TerritoryName] nvarchar(4000),
	[TerritoryGroup] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'confirm_Sales_Person.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [confirm_azdevsynapse_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Staging.SalesOrderDetail (

GO

CREATE VIEW dbo.DimCustomer AS 
SELECT [BusinessEntityID] AS CustomerID,
	[Title] ,
	[FirstName] ,
	[MiddleName] ,
	[LastName] ,
	[Suffix] ,
	[PhoneNumber] ,
	[PhoneNumberType] ,
	[EmailAddress] ,
	[EmailPromotion] ,
	[AddressType] ,
	[AddressLine1] ,
	[AddressLine2] ,
	[City] ,
	[StateProvinceName] ,
	[PostalCode] ,
	[CountryRegionName] 
  FROM STAGING.CUSTOMER
GO

CREATE VIEW dbo.DimProduct AS
SELECT P.*, PC.NAME AS PRODUCT_CATEGORY
  FROM STAGING.PRODUCT P
  JOIN STAGING.PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC
    ON P.ProductSubcategoryID = PC.ProductSubcategoryID


CREATE VIEW dbo.DimSalesPerson AS
SELECT *
  FROM STAGING.SalesPerson

CREATE VIEW dbo.FactSales AS
SELECT *
  FROM STAGING.SalesOrder

CREATE VIEW dbo.FactSalesDetail AS
SELECT sod.SalesOrderDetailId as FactSalesDetailId, so.*, 
       sod.[CarrierTrackingNumber],
	sod.[OrderQty],
	sod.[ProductID],
	sod.[SpecialOfferID],
	sod.[UnitPrice],
	sod.[UnitPriceDiscount],
	sod.[LineTotal]
  FROM STAGING.SalesOrder so
  JOIN STAGING.SalesOrderDetail SOd
    on so.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid

source:
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, current_timestamp, when
from pyspark.sql.window import Window

spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("Raw_to_confirm_scd_type2") \
    .getOrCreate()

source_path = "wasbs://raw-dev@isourcedev11282024.blob.core.windows.net/EXPORT_Sales_Person.parquet"
target_path = "abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/confirm_Sales_Person.parquet"

incoming_data = spark.read.parquet(source_path)


try:
    target_data = spark.read.parquet(target_path)
except Exception as e:
    print("Target table does not exist, creating new table.")
    target_data = spark.createDataFrame([], incoming_data.schema.add("start_date", "timestamp").add("end_date", "timestamp").add("is_current", "boolean"))

incoming_data = incoming_data.withColumn("start_date", current_timestamp()) \
                             .withColumn("end_date", lit(None).cast("timestamp")) \
                             .withColumn("is_current", lit(True))


join_condition = (incoming_data["BusinessEntityID"] == target_data["BusinessEntityID"]) & target_data["is_current"]

comparison_df = incoming_data.join(target_data, join_condition, "left_outer") \
                              .select(
                                  incoming_data["*"],
                                  target_data["attribute1"].alias("old_attribute1"),
                                  target_data["attribute2"].alias("old_attribute2"),
                                  target_data["is_current"].alias("old_is_current")
                              )

merged_data = incoming_data.alias("src").join(
    target_data.alias("tgt"),
    col("src.BusinessEntityID") == col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
    "full_outer"
)

final_data = merged_data.withColumn(
    "action",
    when(col("tgt.BusinessEntityID").isNull(), lit("INSERT"))  # New record
    .when(
        (col("src.attribute1") != col("tgt.attribute1")) |
        (col("src.attribute2") != col("tgt.attribute2")),
        lit("UPDATE")  # Changed record
    ).otherwise(lit("NO_ACTION"))  # No change
)

expired_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "UPDATE") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("tgt.attribute1"),
        col("tgt.attribute2"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        current_timestamp().alias("end_date"),
        lit(False).alias("is_current")
    )

new_records = final_data.filter(col("action").isin("INSERT", "UPDATE")) \
    .select(
        col("src.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("src.attribute1"),
        col("src.attribute2"),
        current_timestamp().alias("start_date"),
        lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("end_date"),
        lit(True).alias("is_current")
    )

unchanged_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "NO_ACTION") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("tgt.attribute1"),
        col("tgt.attribute2"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        col("tgt.end_date"),
        col("tgt.is_current")
    )

final_dim_table = expired_records.union(new_records).union(unchanged_records)

final_dim_table.write.parquet(target_path, mode="overwrite")

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
from pyspark.sql.types import * 


confirm_table_name = table_name.replace("EXPORT", "confirm")

blob_account_name = "isourcedev11282024"
blob_container_name = "raw-dev"

sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

#raw
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("az_isource_blob")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)

#confirm
account_name = 'azdevsynapse' 
container_name = 'confirm'  

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/' % (container_name, account_name) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

wasb_path = 'wasbs://raw-dev@isourcedev11282024.blob.core.windows.net/%s' % (table_name)

    
data = spark.read.load(wasb_path, format='parquet') 


parquet_path = adls_path + confirm_table_name
data.write.parquet(parquet_path, mode = 'overwrite')

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, current_timestamp, when
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("Raw_to_confirm_scd_type2") \
    .config("spark.sql.extensions", "io.delta.sql.DeltaSparkSessionExtension") \
    .config("spark.sql.catalog.spark_catalog", "org.apache.spark.sql.delta.catalog.DeltaCatalog") \
    .getOrCreate()

source_path = "wasbs://raw-dev@isourcedev11282024.blob.core.windows.net/EXPORT_Sales_Person.parquet"
target_path = "abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/confirm_Sales_Person.delta"

incoming_data = spark.read.parquet(source_path)

if DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, target_path):
    target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
    target_data = target_table.toDF()
else:
    print("Target Delta table does not exist, creating new table.")
    target_data = spark.createDataFrame([], incoming_data.schema.add("start_date", "timestamp").add("end_date", "timestamp").add("is_current", "boolean"))

incoming_data = incoming_data.withColumn("start_date", current_timestamp()) \
                             .withColumn("end_date", lit(None).cast("timestamp")) \
                             .withColumn("is_current", lit(True))

merged_data = incoming_data.alias("src").join(
    target_data.alias("tgt"),
    col("src.BusinessEntityID") == col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
    "full_outer"
)

final_data = merged_data.withColumn(
    "action",
    when(col("tgt.BusinessEntityID").isNull(), lit("INSERT"))  
    .when(
        (col("src.attribute1") != col("tgt.attribute1")) |
        (col("src.attribute2") != col("tgt.attribute2")),
        lit("UPDATE")  
    ).when(
        col("src.BusinessEntityID").isNull() & col("tgt.BusinessEntityID").isNotNull(),
        lit("SOFT_DELETE")  
    ).otherwise(lit("NO_ACTION"))  
)

expired_records = final_data.filter(col("action").isin("UPDATE", "SOFT_DELETE")) \
    .select(
        col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("tgt.attribute1"),
        col("tgt.attribute2"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        current_timestamp().alias("end_date"),
        lit(False).alias("is_current")
    )

new_records = final_data.filter(col("action").isin("INSERT", "UPDATE")) \
    .select(
        col("src.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("src.attribute1"),
        col("src.attribute2"),
        current_timestamp().alias("start_date"),
        lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("end_date"),
        lit(True).alias("is_current")
    )

unchanged_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "NO_ACTION") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("tgt.attribute1"),
        col("tgt.attribute2"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        col("tgt.end_date"),
        col("tgt.is_current")
    )

final_dim_table = expired_records.union(new_records).union(unchanged_records)


final_dim_table.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_path)

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, current_timestamp, when
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

spark = SparkSession.builder \
    .appName("Raw_to_confirm_scd_type2") \
    .config("spark.sql.extensions", "io.delta.sql.DeltaSparkSessionExtension") \
    .config("spark.sql.catalog.spark_catalog", "org.apache.spark.sql.delta.catalog.DeltaCatalog") \
    .getOrCreate()

blob_account_name = "isourcedev11282024"
blob_container_name = "raw-dev"

token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("az_isource_blob")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)

source_path = "wasbs://raw-dev@isourcedev11282024.blob.core.windows.net/EXPORT_Sales_Person.parquet"
target_path = "abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/confirm_Sales_Person.delta"

incoming_data = spark.read.parquet(source_path)

if DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, target_path):
    target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
    target_data = target_table.toDF()
else:
    print("Target Delta table does not exist, creating new table.")
    target_data = spark.createDataFrame([], incoming_data.schema.add("start_date", "timestamp").add("end_date", "timestamp").add("is_current", "boolean"))

incoming_data = incoming_data.withColumn("start_date", current_timestamp()) \
                             .withColumn("end_date", lit(None).cast("timestamp")) \
                             .withColumn("is_current", lit(True))

merged_data = incoming_data.alias("src").join(
    target_data.alias("tgt"),
    col("src.BusinessEntityID") == col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
    "full_outer"
)

final_data = merged_data.withColumn(
    "action",
    when(col("tgt.BusinessEntityID").isNull(), lit("INSERT"))  # New record
    .when(
        (col("src.PhoneNumber") != col("tgt.PhoneNumber")) |
        (col("src.EmailAddress") != col("tgt.EmailAddress")),
        lit("UPDATE")  # Changed record
    ).otherwise(lit("NO_ACTION"))  # No change
)

expired_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "UPDATE") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("tgt.PhoneNumber"),
        col("tgt.EmailAddress"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        current_timestamp().alias("end_date"),
        lit(False).alias("is_current")
    )

new_records = final_data.filter(col("action").isin("INSERT", "UPDATE")) \
    .select(
        col("src.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("src.PhoneNumber"),
        col("src.EmailAddress"),
        current_timestamp().alias("start_date"),
        lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("end_date"),
        lit(True).alias("is_current")
    )

unchanged_records = final_data.filter(col("action") == "NO_ACTION") \
    .select(
        col("tgt.BusinessEntityID"),
        col("tgt.PhoneNumber"),
        col("tgt.EmailAddress"),
        col("tgt.start_date"),
        col("tgt.end_date"),
        col("tgt.is_current")
    )

final_dim_table = expired_records.union(new_records).union(unchanged_records)

final_dim_table.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_path)

%%sql
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS confirm.confirm_Sales_Person
USING DELTA
Location 'abfss://confirm@azdevsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/confirm_Sales_Person.delta'
spark.sql(f'CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS confirm.confirm_Sales_Person USING DELTA LOCATION \confirm\confirm_Sales_Person.delta')
